alert.note: Alert for Ashley (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 8:40AM CDT until June 10 at 9:45AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Ashley County in southeastern Arkansas... * Until 945 AM CDT. * At 839 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ingalls to 10 miles northwest of West Crossett to near Huttig, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... West Crossett around 855 AM CDT. North Crossett, Fountain Hill and Old Milo around 905 AM CDT. Hamburg around 920 AM CDT. Snyder around 935 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Blanchton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
